languages.text: "За богохульное нарушение протоколов эксплуатации реликвии сия грешница подлежит ликвидации. Без права искупить свою вину службой в качестве сервитора".
"For blasphemous violation of the relic's protocols of operation, this profaner shall be destroyed. She is not eligible for atonement as a servitor."
languages.original_text: "За богохульное нарушение протоколов эксплуатации реликвии сия грешница подлежит ликвидации. Без права искупить свою вину службой в качестве сервитора".

traits.locale_text: "For blasphemous violation of the relic's protocols of operation, this sinner shall be destroyed. She is not eligible for atonement as a servitor."
"For blasphemous violation of the relic's protocols of operation, this sinner shall be destroyed. She is not eligible for atonement as a servitor."
"For blasphemous violation of the relic's protocols of operation, this profaner shall be destroyed. She is not eligible for atonement as a servitor."
"For blasphemous violation of the relic's protocols of operation, this profaner shall be destroyed. She is not eligible for atonement as a servitor."
"For blasphemous violation of the relic's protocols of operation, this profaner shall be destroyed. She is not eligible for atonement as a servitor."
"For blasphemous violation of the relic's protocols of operation, this profaner shall be destroyed. She is not eligible for atonement as a servitor."

languages.text: "Wegen blasphemischer Verstöße gegen die Betriebsprotokolle des Relikts wird diese Ketzerin vernichtet. Sie hat das Recht verwirkt, als Servitorin Buße tun zu dürfen."
languages.original_text: "For blasphemous violation of the relic's protocols of operation, this profaner shall be destroyed. She is not eligible for atonement as a servitor."

traits.locale_text: "Wegen blasphemischer Verstöße gegen die Betriebsprotokolle des Relikts wird diese Ketzerin vernichtet. Sie hat das Recht verwirkt, als Servitorin Buße tun zu dürfen."

languages.text: « Pour son infraction blasphématoire aux protocoles de fonctionnement de cette relique, cette profanatrice doit être éradiquée. En tant que servante, elle n'a pas droit à une expiation. »
languages.original_text: "For blasphemous violation of the relic's protocols of operation, this profaner shall be destroyed. She is not eligible for atonement as a servitor."

traits.locale_text: « Pour son infraction blasphématoire aux protocoles de fonctionnement de cette relique, cette profanatrice doit être éradiquée. En tant que servante, elle n'a pas droit à une expiation. »

languages.text: “鉴于这个亵渎者对圣物的渎神操作规程，她将被彻底摧毁。考虑她犯下的重罪，哪怕是将她做成机仆，也无法赎清。”
languages.original_text: "For blasphemous violation of the relic's protocols of operation, this profaner shall be destroyed. She is not eligible for atonement as a servitor."

traits.locale_text: “鉴于这个亵渎者对圣物的渎神操作规程，她将被彻底摧毁。考虑她犯下的重罪，哪怕是将她做成奴工，也无法赎清。”

languages.text: 「聖遺物の運用規定に対する冒涜的な違反により、この冒涜者は破壊されるものとする。アレにサーヴィターとしてアトーンメントを受ける資格はない」
languages.original_text: "For blasphemous violation of the relic's protocols of operation, this profaner shall be destroyed. She is not eligible for atonement as a servitor."

traits.locale_text: 「聖遺物の運用規定に対する冒涜的な違反により、この冒涜者は破壊されるものとする。アレにサーヴィターとしてアトーンメントを受ける資格はない」

languages.text: «Por violación blasfema de los protocolos de funcionamiento de la reliquia, esta profanadora será destruida. No es apta para la expiación como servidora».
languages.original_text: "For blasphemous violation of the relic's protocols of operation, this profaner shall be destroyed. She is not eligible for atonement as a servitor."

traits.locale_text: «Por violación blasfema de los protocolos de funcionamiento de la reliquia, esta profanadora será destruida. No es apta para la expiación como servidora».

languages.text: "Bu kâfir, yadigârın işlem protokollerine riayetsizliğinden dolayı yok edilecek. Hizmetör olarak günahlarından arınmayı hak etmiyor."
languages.original_text: "For blasphemous violation of the relic's protocols of operation, this profaner shall be destroyed. She is not eligible for atonement as a servitor."

traits.locale_text: "Bu kâfir, yadigârın protokollerine riayetsizlik sebebiyle yok edilecek. Servitör olarak günahlarından arınmayı hak etmiyor."
